#labels tools,development
This page describes the set of tools used for developing this application and how to install/configure it.

Here is the list of tools used in the development process

  * Eclipse IDE (http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/)
  * Java SE Development Kit (http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp)
  * Slick - 2D Game Library based on LWJGL (http://slick.cokeandcode.com/index.php)
  * The Lightweight Java Game Library (LWJGL, http://www.lwjgl.org/)
  * EBuild - ant based generic build system for Java projects developed in Eclipse (http://ebuild.firefang.net/)

How to use Eclipse to facilitate the process of deploying a Slick-based game using Java WebStart. For more background, refer to the following links.
